metadata.titleEn: Global high-resolution simulated near sea surface temperature precipitation SST dataset (1990-2020)
metadata.titleCn: 全球高分辨率模拟近海洋表层气温-降水-海温数据集（1990-2020）
metadata.description: The global high-resolution simulated near sea surface temperature precipitation SST data set from 1990 to 2020 is from the latest cmip6 project. Cmip6 is the sixth climate model comparison program organized by the world climate research project (WCRP). Original data source: https://www.wcrp-climate.org/wgcm-cmip/wgcm-cmip6 。 The data set includes the global near ocean surface temperature (TMP), precipitation (PR) and sea surface temperature (TOS). The air temperature and precipitation data include the rectangular combination of shared social economic path (SSP) and representative concentration path (RCP) of four different experimental scenarios of scenario MIP in cmip6. (1) Ssp126: upgrade rcp2.6 scenario based on ssp1 (low forcing scenario) (radiation forcing will reach 2.6w/m2 in 2100). (2) Ssp245: upgrade rcp4.5 scenario based on SSP2 (moderate forcing scenario) (radiation forcing will reach 4.5 w / m2 in 2100). (3) Ssp370: a new rcp7.0 emission path based on ssp3 (medium forcing scenario) (radiation forcing will reach 7.0 w / m2 in 2100). (4) Ssp585: upgrade rcp8.5 scenario based on ssp5 (high forcing scenario) (ssp585 is the only SSP scenario that can make radiation forcing reach 8.5 w / m2 in 2100). SST data provides ssp126 scenario data.
metadata.descriptionCn: 1990-2020年全球高分辨率模拟近海洋表层气温-降水-海温数据集来源于最新CMIP6计划。CMIP6是世界气候研究项目（WCRP）组织的第六次气候模式比较计划。原始数据来源于https://www.wcrp-climate.org/wgcm-cmip/wgcm-cmip6。该数据集中包含了全球近海洋表层气温（tmp）、降水（pr）和海温（tos）数据。其中气温和降水数据包含CMIP6中情景模式比较子计划（ScenarioMIP）的4种不同实验场景的共享经济路径(shared socioeconomic pathway, SSP)与辐射强迫(representative concentration pathway, RCP)的矩形组合。(1) SSP126: 在SSP1（低强迫情景）基础上对RCP2.6情景的升级 (辐射强迫在2100年达到2.6W/m2)。(2) SSP245: 在SSP2（中等强迫情景）基础上对RCP4.5情景的升级 (辐射强迫在2100年达到4.5 W/m2)。(3) SSP370: 在SSP3（中等强迫情景）基础上新增的RCP7.0排放路径 (辐射强迫在2100年达到7.0 W/m2)。(4) SSP585: 在SSP5（高强迫情景）基础上对RCP8.5情景的升级(SSP585是唯一能使辐射强迫在2100年达到8.5 W/m2的SSP场景)。海温数据提供SSP126情景数据。
metadata.instructions:
1. Data size: 45 g
2. Data format: netcdf4
3. Folder structure
(1) Precipitation pr
./pr 
./ssp126
./ pr_ Amon_ BCC-CSM2-MR_ ssp126_ r1i1p1f1_ 0.5deg_ gn_ 199001-202012.nc
(2) Temperature TMP
./tmp
./ssp126
./ tmp_ Amon_ BCC-CSM2-MR_ ssp126_ r1i1p1f1_ 0.5deg_ gn_ 199001-202012.nc
(3) SST TOS
/tos
./tos_ Omon_ BCC-CSM2-MR_ r1i1p1f1_ gn_ 199001-202012.nc
Naming rules:
<variable_ name>/
<temporal resolution>/
<model_ name>/
<ssp>/
<member_ id>/
<spatial resolution>/
<grid_ label>/
<time_ range>/
<variable_ Name > / refers to the name of the variable, PR refers to precipitation, TMP refers to temperature, and TOS refers to SST.
<temporary resolution>/ refers to the time resolution, and amon and OMON both represent the monthly scale.
<model_ Name > / indicates which mode it belongs to, bcc-csm2-mr.
<ssp>/ represents the greenhouse gas emission scenario.
<member_ ID > / are some control indicators of the operation mode. member_ Id = r<k>i<l>p<m>f<n>, where k=realization_ index； l=initialization_ index； m=physics_ index； n=forcing_ index
<spatial_ Resolution > / indicates spatial resolution.
<grid_ Label> indicates the type of grid for the output data.
<time_ Range> indicates the data time range.
metadata.instructionsCn:
1.	数据大小：45 G
2.	数据格式：netcdf4
3.	文件夹结构
（1）降水pr
	./pr 
		./ssp126
			./ pr_Amon_BCC-CSM2-MR_ssp126_r1i1p1f1_0.5deg_gn_199001-202012.nc
（2）气温tmp
	./tmp
		./ssp126
			./ tmp_Amon_BCC-CSM2-MR_ssp126_r1i1p1f1_0.5deg_gn_199001-202012.nc
（3）海温tos
	/tos
	./tos_Omon_BCC-CSM2-MR_r1i1p1f1_gn_199001-202012.nc
命名规则：
<variable_name>/
	<temporal resolution>/
		<model_name>/
			<ssp>/
				<member_id>/
					<spatial resolution>/
						<grid_label>/
							<time_range>/
	<variable_name>/ 表示是变量名称，pr为降水，tmp为温度，tos为海温。
	<temporal resolution>/ 表示时间分辨率，Amon和Omon均代表月尺度。
	<model_name>/ 表示属于哪一个模式，BCC-CSM2-MR。
	<ssp>/ 代表温室气体排放情景。
	<member_id>/ 是运行模式的一些控制指标。member_id = r<k>i<l>p<m>f<n>，其中，k=realization_index；l=initialization_index；m=physics_index；n=forcing_index
	<spatial_resolution>/ 表示空间分辨率。
	<grid_label>表示输出数据的网格的类型。
	<time_range>表示数据时间范围。

literatureList.titleEn: Overview of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6) experimental design and organization
literatureList.referenceEn: Eyring, V., Bony, S., Meehl, G.A., Senior, C.A., Stevens, B., Stouffer, R.J., & Taylor, K.E. (2016). Overview of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6) experimental design and organization, Geosci. Model Dev., 9, 1937-1958, doi:10.5194/gmd-9-1937-2016.

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collected in global high-resolution simulations for near-surface air temperature, precipitation, and sea surface temperature from 1990-2020?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 1990年至2020年期间，全球高分辨率模拟收集的近地面空气温度、降水量和海表温度的数据特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: global near-surface air temperature, precipitation, sea surface temperature, SSP126, SSP245, SSP370, SSP585
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全球近地表空气温度、降水、海表温度、SSP126、SSP245、SSP370、SSP585

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different shared socioeconomic pathways (SSPs) and representative concentration pathways (RCPs) combinations are included in a global high-resolution simulated dataset of near-ocean surface air temperature, precipitation, and sea surface temperature from 1990 to 2020?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在1990年至2020年的全球高分辨率模拟数据集中，包含了多少种不同的共享社会经济路径（SSPs）和代表性浓度路径（RCPs）组合，涉及近海面空气温度、降水量和海面温度？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the meaning of 'shared socioeconomic pathway' (SSP) in the context of climate modeling datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: “共享社会经济路径”（SSP）在气候建模数据集中的含义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of climate modeling datasets, 'shared socioeconomic pathway' (SSP) refers to a scenario framework that describes different pathways of societal development and their implications on climate change. SSPs are used to model potential futures based on varying levels of socioeconomic challenges for mitigation and adaptation, combined with representative concentration pathways (RCPs) to assess climate impacts. For example, SSP126 represents a low-forcing scenario that builds on SSP1 with RCP2.6, indicating a scenario where radiative forcing reaches 2.6 W/m2 by 2100.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在气候建模数据集的背景下，“共享社会经济路径”（SSP）指的是一个情景框架，描述了不同的社会发展路径及其对气候变化的影响。SSP用于基于不同的社会经济挑战水平进行建模，以评估减缓和适应的潜在未来，并与代表性浓度路径（RCP）结合，以评估气候影响。例如，SSP126代表一个低强迫情景，基于SSP1与RCP2.6，表明一个到2100年辐射强迫达到2.6 W/m2的情景。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the experimental scenarios SSP126 and SSP585 compare in terms of their approach to modeling future climate conditions using shared socioeconomic pathways and representative concentration pathways?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 实验场景SSP126和SSP585在使用共享社会经济路径和代表性浓度路径建模未来气候条件的方法上有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The SSP126 scenario is based on SSP1, which represents a low forcing scenario, and is an upgrade of the RCP2.6 scenario, with a radiative forcing reaching 2.6 W/m2 by 2100. In contrast, the SSP585 scenario is based on SSP5, representing a high forcing scenario, and is an upgrade of the RCP8.5 scenario, with the radiative forcing reaching 8.5 W/m2 by 2100. These scenarios provide different pathways for socioeconomic development and emissions, impacting the modeling of future climate conditions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: SSP126情景基于SSP1，代表低强迫情景，是RCP2.6情景的升级版，到2100年辐射强迫达到2.6 W/m2。相比之下，SSP585情景基于SSP5，代表高强迫情景，是RCP8.5情景的升级版，到2100年辐射强迫达到8.5 W/m2。这些情景提供了不同的社会经济发展和排放路径，影响未来气候条件的建模。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences on data accuracy and model predictions when applying different shared socioeconomic pathways (SSP) and representative concentration pathways (RCP) combinations to simulate global near-surface air temperature and precipitation data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在应用不同的共享社会经济路径（SSP）和代表性浓度路径（RCP）组合来模拟全球近地表空气温度和降水数据时，可能对数据准确性和模型预测产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Different SSP and RCP combinations can result in varied data accuracy and model predictions due to differing assumptions about socioeconomic factors and radiative forcing levels. For instance, SSP126 represents a low forcing scenario, while SSP585 represents a high forcing scenario, affecting the projected near-surface air temperature, precipitation, and sea temperature data. These scenarios provide insights into potential climate outcomes, helping to assess the impacts of different climate policies and socioeconomic developments on future climate conditions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 不同的SSP和RCP组合可能导致数据准确性和模型预测的差异，因为它们对社会经济因素和辐射强迫水平的假设不同。例如，SSP126代表低强迫情景，而SSP585代表高强迫情景，这影响了近地表空气温度、降水量和海洋温度数据的预测。这些情景提供了对潜在气候结果的洞察，有助于评估不同气候政策和社会经济发展的影响对未来气候条件的影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives behind collecting global high-resolution simulation data of near-surface oceanic air temperature, precipitation, and sea surface temperature from 1990 to 2020?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集1990年至2020年全球高分辨率模拟数据的近地面海洋空气温度、降水量和海面温度的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives behind collecting global high-resolution simulation data of near-surface oceanic air temperature, precipitation, and sea surface temperature from 1990 to 2020 are to facilitate comprehensive climate modeling and comparison through the CMIP6 initiative. This effort aims to understand the impacts of various shared socioeconomic pathways (SSPs) and representative concentration pathways (RCPs) on climate projections, providing insights into potential future climate scenarios and aiding in climate change mitigation and adaptation strategies.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集1990年至2020年全球高分辨率近海洋空气温度、降水量和海表温度模拟数据的主要目标是通过CMIP6倡议促进全面的气候建模和比较。此项工作旨在理解各种共享社会经济路径（SSPs）和代表性浓度路径（RCPs）对气候预测的影响，提供潜在未来气候情景的洞察，并帮助气候变化的减缓和适应策略。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are utilized to integrate different experimental scenarios like SSP126, SSP245, SSP370, and SSP585 in the global high-resolution simulation of near-surface ocean air temperature, precipitation, and sea surface temperature data collection?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在全球高分辨率模拟近地表海洋空气温度、降水和海表温度数据收集时，如何整合不同的实验场景，如SSP126、SSP245、SSP370和SSP585，所采用的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collection utilizes a matrix combination of shared socioeconomic pathways (SSP) and representative concentration pathways (RCP) specific to each experimental scenario. These scenarios are based on updates to existing RCP scenarios under different SSPs, with each scenario representing different levels of radiative forcing by the year 2100: SSP126 with 2.6 W/m2, SSP245 with 4.5 W/m2, SSP370 with 7.0 W/m2, and SSP585 with 8.5 W/m2. These combinations are part of the ScenarioMIP under CMIP6, which are integrated to simulate the variables of interest.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集利用了共享社会经济路径（SSP）和代表性浓度路径（RCP）的矩阵组合，针对每个实验场景。这些场景基于不同SSP下对现有RCP场景的更新，每个场景代表到2100年不同的辐射强迫水平：SSP126为2.6 W/m2，SSP245为4.5 W/m2，SSP370为7.0 W/m2，以及SSP585为8.5 W/m2。这些组合是CMIP6下的ScenarioMIP的一部分，旨在模拟感兴趣的变量。
